page.title: 04FARMING-GRASSLAND
page.content: Most of the land is covered by {permanent grassland.}Animals{graze it.Sometimes farmers use an electric fence so that the animals can only eat a bit at a time.Some grass is cut and dried in{June}to make{hay}which is fed to animals in winter.Most is cut and taken to a big pit at the farm.It is covered with polythene sheets.It gets hot and ferments.It smells horrible but cows like to eat it in winter. {Barley and oats}are grown for animal feed.As they are growing they are sprayed with chemicals to kill diseases.In summer a combine harvester cuts the{corn}and takes it to a big bin at the farm.It is ground up and fed to the animals.Farmers put fertilizer on their fields to put into the soil to grow good crops.
